description:
This is the summer version of their awesome bamboo crew in a lightweight bamboo microstripe material. The Mac Microstripe is a premium-fitted long sleeve shirt that was carefully crafted to make tall men feel comfortable on any occasion. This tall t-shirt feels amazing and fits tall guys perfectly.

Their Mac Microstripe premium long-sleeve comes loaded with features you will only find at Navas Lab. From the exceptional fabric they use, to the perfect long and slim fit they are passionate about every aspect of the clothing they produce.

The proven anti-odour properties of their bamboo fabric makes this tall long-sleeve shirt a must-have in any wardrobe. The cut is ideal for tall slim guys and the look is perfect for any occasion.
name: Navas Lab Apparel Mac Microstripe - LS Tall Shirt - Mens
